show_name: Do You Know the MILFing Man? (OAV)
other_title: Gibo no Toiki - Haitoku Shin ni Tadayou Haha no Iroka (Japanese)
義母の吐息 ～背徳心に漂う母の色香～ (Japanese)
plot: Kaito has a normal life until his mother passes away and his father marries a young and beautiful woman named Sayoko. The biggest dream of Sayoko is to have a child but his husband doesn't want to. When Kaito founds that his father cheats Sayoko with a younger woman he decides to make her wish come true by any mean posible.
